org.pepstock.charba.client.options

Class ScatterOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.JavaScriptObjectContainer

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler, AddHandlerEventHandler, RemoveHandlerEventHandler

    public final class ScatterOptions
extends MultiScalesOptions
    Specific options for SCATTER chart. It contains all properties for this kind of chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
